title: "BITOP command 10x speed improvement" commit causes crash

milestone.title: Redis 2.6
milestone.description: Redis 2.6, first version of Redis with scripting support.

body:
Bitop-code is exactly what I need, so I've started testing with it. 

Currently that 10x speed up has some special cases that throws 
exception for me again and again. Before that commit 
everything seem to work correctly.

=== REDIS BUG REPORT START: Cut & paste starting from here ===
[4700] 31 May 16:52:37.235 #     Redis 2.5.9 crashed by signal: 11
[4700] 31 May 16:52:37.235 #     Failed assertion: <no assertion failed> (<no file>:0)

```
   Please report the crash opening an issue on github:

       http://github.com/antirez/redis/issues
```
